attributes.action: Ban the use of mobile phones in confined public spaces.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is rarely a pleasure travelling these days on public transport particularly, one's 'headspace' being continually interrupted by a series of loud conversations one can do nothing to turn off. This is bad enough on buses and trains, in an aircraft....with other huge stresses...suicidal! What about our right to 'peaceful headspace?'
